net.dean.jraw.http

Class HttpHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.dean.jraw.http.HttpHelper

  • public class HttpHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for the lowest level of networking found in this library. It can execute RESTful HTTP requests through the use of the execute methods

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  HttpHelper.RequestBuilder
      This class helps create a configuration for executing an HTTP request using Apache's HttpComponents.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HttpHelper(java.lang.String userAgent)
      Instantiates a new HttpClientHelper and adds a given string as the value for the User-Agent header for every request

    • Method Summary

      Conducts an HTTP request

      Gets the list of headers that will be included with every request

      Gets the User-Agent header

        public org.apache.http.client.methods.CloseableHttpResponse execute(HttpHelper.RequestBuilder b)
                                                             throws NetworkException
        Conducts an HTTP request
        Parameters:
        b - The RequestBuilder to use to execute the request
        Returns:
        A CloseableHttpResponse formed in the execution of the HTTP request
        Throws:
        NetworkException - If the status code was not "200 OK"
